name: Ember of Long Night Flint
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  In earthly poetry, light is often a metaphor of hope. The fires burn out insilence, only to reveal the onward path in the darkness before dawn.  Regardless, neither the first Torchforger nor the friend with whom he paintedElysium as a child ever knew where the illuminated path would lead until themoment the lights were extinguished.
